results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of n X n (0,1) matrices with at most k 1's in each row or column.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..84
xref: Cf. A002720 (column k=1), A197458 (column k=2), A008300 (exactly k 1s).
Main diagonal and first lower diagonal give: A002416, A048291.
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 09 2017
